scripts.dev: npm run bundle-client && tsx watch src/index.ts & npx tailwindcss -i ./src/styles.css -o ./public/_output.css --watch
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp -R content dist/ && npm run bundle-client && npx tailwindcss -i ./src/styles.css -o ./public/_output.css --minify
scripts.export: rm -rf export && npm run bundle-client && npm run build && (npm run start & pid=$! && (tsx ./scripts/generate-static.ts || (kill $pid && exit 1)) && kill $pid)
